content.rendered:
Directed by Syed Ahmad Afzal

Written by Syed Ahmad Afzal. Akhilesh Jaiswal. Raj Saluja. Ravi Kumar Tiwari

Cast Gauahar Khan( Anuradha Singh Srivastav / …9 episodes, 2022 ). Gulshan Devaiah( Aditya Rai / …9 episodes, 2022 ). Pawan Malhotra( Dhansu Yadav9 episodes, 2022 ). Niharika Porwal( Aisha9 episodes, 2022 ). Gauri Chakraborty( Sumitra Rai9 episodes, 2022 ). Maya Sahu( Rekha9 episodes, 2022 ). Ravi Kumar Tiwari( Sonu9 episodes, 2022 ). Rehan Kidwai( Aslam Shaikh9 episodes, 2022 ). Iram Badar Khan( Vidya Rai8 episodes, 2022 ). Kumar Saurabh( Nanhe8 episodes, 2022 ). Puneet Kumar Mishra( Swadesh Rawat5 episodes, 2022 ). Sapna Agrawal( Geeta3 episodes, 2022 ). Nanda Yadav( Roshini Singh3 episodes, 2022 ). Aatm Prakash Mishra( Yash Soni2 episodes, 2022 ). Neeraj Negi( Bittu Pandey2 episodes, 2022 ). Navdeep Singh( Akhtari1 episode, 2022 ). Gaurav Singh( Rahul Somani1 episode, 2022 ). Rehmaan Shaikh( Chaman1 episode, 2022 ). Debashree Chakrobarty( Seema Parihar1 episode, 2022 ). Gaurav Singh B( Hitesh1 episode, 2022 ). Rajendra Sethi( Jungal Singhunknown episodes ). Shivaani Singh( Shivaani Dubeyunknown episodes ). Jaihind Kumar( Madho Donaldunknown episodes ). Kumar Saurabh( Nanheunknown episodes ). Chetan Swaroop Tirdia( Prabhakarunknown episodes ). Sandeep Goyat( Vikram Dangiunknown episodes ). Gaurav Singh( Rahul Somaniunknown episodes)

Language Hindi

Producers Piyush Gupta. Deeya Choudhary. Shasham Jain

Production MX Player.

Season 1

Episodes 9
